#Text=CanadaVOTES : NDP candidate Michael McMahon running in Prince Edward — Hastings
#Text=Friday , September 26 , 2008
#Text=On October 14 , 2008 , Canadians will be heading to the polls for the federal election .
#Text=New Democratic Party candidate Michael McMahon is standing for election in the riding of Prince Edward — Hastings .
#Text=McMahon moved to Windsor in 1951 , getting a degree in education , teaching locally and in Papua New Guinea .

#Text=He served as Branch President of the Ontario Secondary School Teachers ' Federation ( OSSTF ) , served on multiple of their major committees , and recently retired from the Hastings and Prince Edward District School Board .
#Text=Wikinews contacted Michael McMahon , to talk about the issues facing Canadians , and what they and their party would do to address them .
#Text=Wikinews is in the process of contacting every candidate , in every riding across the country , no matter their political stripe .
#Text=All interviews are conducted over e-mail , and interviews are published unedited , allowing candidates to impart their full message to our readers , uninterrupted .
#Text=Since being redefined in 2003 , the riding includes the County of Prince Edward and the County of Hastings ( except the City of Quinte West ) .
#Text=Conservative Party member Daryl Kramp currently represents the riding , after beating a Liberal in 2004 .
#Text=Ken Cole of the Liberals and Alan Coxwell of the Greens are also running in the riding .
#Text=For more information , visit the campaign 's official website , listed below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=My political involvement grew from seeing the disparity between rich and poor in our wealthy country , and concern for our people who are not getting their fair share .
#Text=I was attracted to the New Democratic Party because of the importance placed on the social issues , such as poverty , health care , education , housing and health of the environment .
#Text=I joined the NDP when I decided to do something about the way things were going for average Canadians , and the Canada we all share .
#Text=Our people , our Country , and our environment must always come before the interests of big corporations .
#Text=Only the Federal level can address these issues .
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=This is my second campaign for MP .
#Text=I have been involved with my union , OSSTF , for many years in various roles , including branch president .
#Text=I was a high school teacher for 30 years .
#Text=This has given me a real insight into the people and families in our riding .
#Text=I taught Science .
#Text=I am a trained critical thinker with a good understanding of the realities of energy , environment , technology , and the economy .
#Text=I am well suited to play a part in our shift from fossil fuels to a new sustainable energy currency .
#Text=And I will be able to explain it .
